submodules.title: Interoperability Engine
submodules.description: Facilitates seamless asset transfers, messaging, and smart contract calls across multiple blockchains, ensuring a unified experience for developers and users.

submodules.title: Multi-Signature Verification
submodules.description: Enhances security by requiring multiple signatures for transactions, ensuring that only authorized parties can execute cross-chain operations.

submodules.title: Optimistic Proof Mechanism
submodules.description: Utilizes optimistic proofs to validate transactions, allowing for faster confirmations while maintaining a high level of security.

submodules.title: Route Optimization
submodules.description: AI agents analyze various bridging routes to recommend the most efficient paths for asset transfers, minimizing costs and time.

submodules.title: Anomaly Detection
submodules.description: Employs machine learning algorithms to monitor transactions for unusual patterns, alerting users to potential security threats or inefficiencies.

submodules.title: dApp Orchestration Assistance
submodules.description: Provides intelligent recommendations for managing cross-chain decentralized applications, streamlining interactions across different blockchain environments.

submodules.title: Unified SDK
submodules.description: Offers a comprehensive software development kit that simplifies the integration of cross-chain functionalities into decentralized applications, supporting both EVM and non-EVM chains.

submodules.title: API Access
submodules.description: Provides a robust API for developers to interact with the CrossChain protocol, enabling easy access to features like token transfers and smart contract messaging.

submodules.title: Gas Fee Prediction
submodules.description: Utilizes AI to predict gas fees for transactions across different chains, helping developers optimize costs and improve user experience.

submodules.title: Self Protocol Integration
submodules.description: Integrates with Self Protocol to provide secure cross-chain identity verification, ensuring that users can authenticate themselves across multiple blockchains without compromising security.

submodules.title: On-Chain Identity Solutions
submodules.description: Facilitates the creation and management of on-chain identities that are recognized across all supported chains, enhancing user trust and security.

submodules.title: DAO Governance
submodules.description: Empowers the community to participate in decision-making processes regarding the listing of new chains and the management of relayers, ensuring a decentralized and democratic approach.

submodules.title: Compliance Mechanisms
submodules.description: Incorporates compliance features to adhere to regulatory standards across different jurisdictions, ensuring that the platform operates within legal frameworks.

submodules.title: ZK-Proof Integration
submodules.description: Utilizes zero-knowledge proofs to enable privacy-preserving transfers, allowing users to conduct transactions without revealing sensitive information.

submodules.title: Security Audits
submodules.description: Regularly conducts security audits and assessments to identify vulnerabilities and enhance the overall security posture of the CrossChain protocol.
